tokens.resolved_gloss: good (as an adjective) in the widest sense; used likewise as a noun, both in the masculine and the feminine, the singular and the plural (good, a good or good thing, a good man or woman; the good, goods or good things, good men or women), also as an adverb (well)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)

tokens.resolved_gloss: properly, to tread or frequent; usually to follow (for pursuit or search); by implication, to seek or ask; specifically to worship
